p: In the solid state structure of 4 (Figure 4), an AsH ligand coordinates to a Cr(CO) 5 and an Fe 2(CO) 8 fragment. The coordination geometry around the arsenic atom is tetrahedrally distorted. A phenyl‐substituted complex [{Fe 2(CO) 8]AsPh{Cr(CO) 5}] ( C) with a related structural motif was reported. 26 Moreover, in the literature, there are only a few complexes described containing AsH ligands in which the arsenic is tetrahedrally coordinated such as [{HOs 2(CO) 7}AsH{HOs(CO) 4}] or [Et 4N][HAs{Fe 2(CO) 6(μ‐CO)(μ‐H)}{Fe(CO) 4}]. 27
